page.title: 12THORNBURY INDUSTRIAL ESTATE
page.content: The Industrial Estate covers a large area of almost flat land on the southern edge of Thornbury. There are fields and trees nearby.There are 44 units altogether which include small factories, warehouses, vehicle depots, postal sorting office, distributors, a dairy factory, offices, workshops and a variety of services for home and industry. The numbers working in the different industries vary from 2 self employed people in a small workshop to 200 working in a factory making lenses for spectacles. The buildings on the estate are quite new and are made out of concrete and prefabricated panels.They are mostly grey and quite low in height.
